mapper.select: SELECT E.EX_NO, O.BUY_NO, O.O_NO, O.U_ID, D.D_STATE, E.B_REASONS, P.P_NO, P.P_NAME FROM T4_EXCHANGE E INNER JOIN T4_DELIVERY D ON E.BUY_NO = D.BUY_NO INNER JOIN T4_ORDER O ON E.BUY_NO = O.BUY_NO INNER JOIN T4_PRODUCT P ON O.P_NO = P.P_NO WHERE D.D_STATE NOT LIKE '%거절%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T4_EXCHANGE E INNER JOIN T4_DELIVERY D ON E.BUY_NO = D.BUY_NO WHERE D.D_STATE NOT LIKE '%거절%'
